common.closestDeparture: This is the closest departure to the specified date

cargo.effectiveInsurance: Insurance is a cost effective and simple way to cover for physical loss or damage to goods in transit.
cargo.cargoInsurance: Cargo Insurance provides cover on all risk terms for physical loss or damage to cargo during transport by land, sea or air.
cargo.quoteInsuranceTail: to quote insurance for my cargo
cargo.quoteInsuranceNoTail: to quote insurance for my cargo
cargo.conditionFirst: When you ship goods from outside the European Union (EU), you may be charged customs duty and/or VAT. You can either handle the customs on your own, or have Greencarrier handle it for you.
cargo.conditionSecond: To cover our costs when we present your goods to the customs authorities – and pay any customs duty or VAT due on your behalf – we charge a clearance / handling fee. The fee depends on the value of the goods you are shipping, and can be found here to the right.
cargo.costEffective: A cost effective and simple way to cover for physical loss or damage to goods in transit.
cargo.euRules: When you ship goods from outside the European Union (EU), you may be charged customs duty and/or VAT according to local regulations.
cargo.noCustomsHead: A customs declaration is mandatory to pass a national border when exporting or importing. If you choose to handle the customs clearance on your own,
cargo.noCustomsTail: will need a copy of the customs declaration.
